data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Taraclia.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Taraclia, Moldova
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,727 believers in Taraclia, Moldova a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Taraclia, Moldova to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Taraclia, Moldova find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Taraclia.
Father, make bold the prophets in Taraclia, Moldova so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Taraclia, Moldova, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary:
the state of Taraclia, Moldova has a population of 37,400.

We estimate Taraclia has 1,727 people who might know Jesus, 26,502 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,171 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
